Item 2.02 - Results of Operations and Fi.content: On October 17, 2023, Johnson & Johnson issued the attached press release (Exhibit 99.1) announcing its sales and earnings for the third quarter ended October 1, 2023.

subsections.Exhibit 99.1: Press Release dated October 17, 2023 for the period ended October 1, 2023
subsections.Exhibit 99.2: Unaudited Comparative Supplementary Sales Data and Condensed Consolidated Statement of Earnings for the fiscal third quarter and nine months
